markdownRemark.html:
import { Link as GatsbyLink } from “gatsby”


For roughly the past 5 years I have been working as what I think is safe to call a software developer. This role, to my mind, fully entails the act of writing, maintaining and, if you are lucky, deleting code. As I have mentioned in a previous post

frontmatter.title: The most important thing a programmer does
